lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson is known for having a theory about almost anything and he says that the United States have been handicapped at the Ryder Cup over the last two decades by poor preparation.

headline.print_headline: Love Has Put U.S. in a Position to Succeed, Says Mickelson
headline.main: Love Has Put U.S. in a Position to Succeed, Says Mickelson
